title: How do I access the app lock using my fingerprint?
answer:
You can access the App lock using your fingerprint and the password after the Access app lock is enabled. 

 Go to Settings > Fingerprint ID > Fingerprint management and enter the unlock password. You need to enter the password when enabling the Access app lock. If you haven't enabled the App lock, the screen to enable it will be displayed. You can create one and set a password. After that you can enable the Access app lock of the Fingerprint ID. 

 Go to Phone manager > App lock to select applications you want to lock.
